titleStmt.title: His Majesties most gracious speech to both houses of Parliament, on Thursday the 31 of December.
titleStmt.author: William III, King of England, 1650-1702.
England and Wales. Parliament.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
